msg: implement the amazing rules on when getTimerService() and the TimerService and Timer methods are available

author: chirino
msg: MDBs do not have a proxy factory.  NPE was being thrown due to not checking

author: dain
msg: Check for an already exisitng ejb context in the transaction context before createing a new one.  This eliminates an AssertionError thrown from reentrant calls.

author: dain
msg: In remove(Handle), check if handle is invalid before invoking remove on the server

author: dblevins
msg: Added legacy support for ServiceEndpoint interface
Fixed issue with StAX provider not being loaded due to the way it incorrectly "detects" which classloader to use.
